landingAim.purpose: Develop a tool to support transition from a money society collapsing to a model based on the free exchange, the sharing and the collaboration between humans.
landingAim.createTool: Create a tool to manage project opened to everybody.
landingAim.cTool: A tool that will enable to organize different groups and associations efficiently. A tool encrypted, free, open-source, taking aim at the 'horizontality'in the management of project.
landingAim.doOfSystemD: Make SystemD the social network of free exchange project.
landingAim.dOfSystD: Creation of interfaces to do a meeting place through differents projects: Search geolocated by skills-interests, encrypted instant messaging, shared blog, etc...
landingAim.developFreeNetwork: Develop a free and sharing network
landingAim.dFreeNetwork: Allow users and projects to share their resources in order to create a big free and non-commercial network.

landingContact.github: Follow the progress of project, make issues and pull-requests.
landingContact.email: Contact-me by e-mail to share yours observations, ideas, suggestions, propositions, ...
landingContact.chat: Join us on the chat to discuss with the team of project.

landingPlus.panonymous: Login with a pseudo, no need email, and use a tor-browser for more anonymity.
landingPlus.pfree: How imagine differently a platform whose the purpose is the promotion of free exchange between humans?
landingPlus.pencrypted: Contents shared and the list of the projects you have selected are encrypted "end-to-end".

landingRoadmap.pfirstPhase: Interface to make user account and connection to platform.
landingRoadmap.p4firstPhase: Invitation for projects and to manage members.
landingRoadmap.p7firstPhase: List of ergonomics tasks for each project.
landingRoadmap.p8firstPhase: Interface to support or participate at SystemD
landingRoadmap.psecondPhase: Interface to select his skills for each users.
landingRoadmap.p2secondPhase: Interface to select his interests for each users.
landingRoadmap.p4secondPhase: Advanced research tools to research potentials contributors / interstings projects.
landingRoadmap.pthirdPhase: Taking of consideration of  issues and improvements.
landingRoadmap.p2thirdPhase: Interface to list shared materials assets.
landingRoadmap.p4thirdPhase: Possibility to make advertisements for personals and projects requirements.

landingTitle.h3title: Encrypted platform for collaboratives and free projects
landingTitle.ptitle: Make projects, join your friends, and take advantage of free and secure tools to organize your association or group together.

landingTools.pcalendar: To plan with your group the next events of your project.
landingTools.ptaskList: To see the progress of the project and to select tasks interactively by the participants.
landingTools.pforum: Communicate together, by themes or not.
landingTools.pmodularTools: Interactives map, planning in agile m√©thod, and others tools will develop.
landingTools.psimpleTools: user-friendly organization tools and encrypted content for optimum privacy.

loginFormJs.key: Recovery and decrypting the private key

signinFormJs.errmail: your username can't be an email address

signinContainer.psignin: System-D offers you a free collaborative workspace and totally
signinContainer.p2signin: Like Telegram or Signal, only you and the members of project will can decrypt and read the contents you post, even developers will not can.
signinContainer.p3-2signin: of his users : neither email required or personals informations. However we will not can
signinContainer.p3-3signin: help you if you forgot your password.

newInvitation.title: Invitation link creation
newInvitation.infoQuote: By transmitting invitations links, you are transmitting the project ciphers keys to everyone who have acces to the link during the validity duration of the generated link.

showInvitation.title: Invitation link
showInvitation.infoLink: copy this link and send it to the person(s) you want to invite in your project.
showInvitation.invitMessage: You have been invited by someone to join a project on System-D : the free cyphered web-platform for collaborative projects . Click on the link below to see the invitation.
showInvitation.infoQr: If the person you want to invite is near you,  he or she can scan this QR-code to access the invitation.
showInvitation.infoDestroy: By deleting the invitation, You delete the possibility to use the invitation link for access the cypher keys of your project.
showInvitation.deleted: The invitation link has been removed
